name: Crazy Gun Car
description:
Crazy Gun Car takes you on a wild and desolate ride, you will fight for survival in your tricked out car. Defeat enemy warlords who are unforgiving and shoot them to oblivion in this mad racing and shooting game.

***FEATURES***
- Different challenging modes to get you all worked up!
- Machine guns not cutting through? Use your missiles when you are stuck!
- The enemies are very skillful; they get increasingly difficult to beat. Good if you love a challenge!
